issue.title: [C++] Investigate header cost reduction
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7531](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7531). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Using https://github.com/aras-p/ClangBuildAnalyzer we could create to find out the worst offenders in terms of header file parsing cost when compiling.

comments.body:
